rules.value: 'paul ryan' OR paulryan OR romney OR obama OR biden OR barack OR mitt OR #barry OR #willard OR debate OR #forward OR #tcot OR #tlot OR #sgp OR #twisters OR #uniteblue OR #p2 OR teaparty OR 'tea party' OR gop OR rnc OR dnc OR dnc2012 OR rnc2012 OR election2012 OR #gop2012 OR #romney2012 OR #dnc2012 OR #obama2012 OR #Election2012 OR vote OR '47 percent' OR 47% OR  #dontdoublemyrate OR lehrer OR bigbird OR 'big bird' OR #pmtdebate OR #forwardnotback OR letsnot OR 'Let’s not' OR Medicare OR #cantafford4more OR “borrow from your parents” OR '5 seconds'
